name: How Far Would You Go?
description:
Innovation Studios presents: How Far Would You Go?

Welcome! 

Take an adventure to test how far you would go to help a homeless people when they are in need.  This game will test your trust, compassion and generosity through a series of decisions.  You will be communicating with the homeless person through text messages and make you decision after conversing and learning more about their past.  

How to play:

You start the game  by choosing the "play" option on the menu screen, then you enter your name and click "continue". You will then be introduced to either Georgia or Fred and read about their backgrounds. Then can click "continue". You will then be taken to the text message screen where at the end of each conversation you will be presented with an option to either help or deny help to the homeless person. There is also breaking news that will pop up to inform you on any news in the area and you must then click "ok" to be taken back to the text message conversation. Each choice you make throughout the game will determine if you help the homeless person get back on their feet or go back to their old ways. Make each decision carefully and good luck!
